discussion_comments.comment_body:
This script is simply a shortcut for the husky add command, which allows you to add new Git hooks.
With Husky v9, the husky add command is used to create new hooks, but you can run it directly with npx husky add or pnpm exec husky add without needing a dedicated script in package.json.
